data.prayer: There are 580,300 people living in the county of Solan. Only about 6,383 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Solan, Himachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Solan, Himachal Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Solan.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Solan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jat Dhindsa (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Solan, Himachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Solan hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Solan, Himachal Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Solan
location.people_groups_list: Chhimba (Sikh traditions), Jat Nain, Jat Dhindsa (Sikh traditions), Kir Nungar, Rajput Baria (Sikh traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chhimba (Sikh traditions) (123,000), Jat Nain (37,000), Jat Dhindsa (Sikh traditions) (44,000), Kir Nungar (200), Rajput Baria (Sikh traditions) (2,700)
